archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Automated Payments Out Pay [APOP]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Automated Payments Outpay Database, used to hold Postal Order and AP Payout records. It is a generic construct and has been used for other ADC transactions that need to maintain state between transactions (such as Bureau Pre-Order).
The design allows the database to be customised using reference data The APOP database contains a table of predefined fields. APOP is configured using meta data to define which of the fields are to be used and allows the predefined fields to be given a meaningful name for the particular service. (e.g. the predefined field Alpha_1 may be called Product Description for the Stock Ordering service). The Meta Data defines the Voucher States that are used to manage the lifecycle of a voucher record (e.g. Sold -> Encashed -> Archived) The Meta Data defines the allowable state changes to ensure the lifecycle steps are performed in the permitted order. Business Rules for user access, data input, data output, state changes and transaction types are all set using Meta Data as are error messages and exceptions. Each voucher is given a unique ID for the particular APOP service. This Voucher ID is used to reference the voucher record. APOP is able to retain a history of updates made to a voucher record for audit.
